attributes.action: continue and increase support of peace work and development in Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sudan needs help and support with development of education and health care   services. Many schools and hospitals were destroyed during the civil war and many are without good education and medical care. They need support from Britain and other countries to help develop a peaceful solution to the country's problems. May there be no more fighting and they will be able to live in peaceful co-existence together. Support is needed for the Salisbury-Sudan link to help them continue their support of our brothers and sisters in Sudan.
